name: Soul Train (IgniteMood)
description:
Soul Train begins when you lost your brothers' soul in a weird train when different creatures will chase you to take your soul, fight enemies by reflecting they attacks by using your Clairvoyance.

New enemies will come soon, and also new ways to figth against them!

If you have any feedback please contact to our dev team:

ignitemoodbusiness@gmail.com
nolan.m.mcallister@gmail.com

Stay home and safe,

Sincerely, the whole "Soul Train" dev team.
